select c.nombre as ClienteName, c.documento as ClienteDoc, c.telefono as ClientePhone, c.direccion as ClienteDir, c.email as ClienteEmail, c.vetado as ClienteVetado,
ir.id as ir_ItemRentadoId, ir.fechainiciorenta as ir_ItemRentadoStartDate, ir.fechafinrenta ir_ItemRentadoEndDate,
i.id as ir_item_ItemId, i.nombre as ir_item_ItemName, i.descripcion as ir_item_ItemDesc, i.fechalanzamiento as ir_item_ItemReleaseDate, i.tarifaxdia as ir_item_ItemTariff, i.formatorenta as ir_item_ItemFormat, i.genero as ir_item_ItemGender,
ti.id as ir_item_tipoItem_TipoItemId, ti.descripcion as ir_item_TipoItemDesc
FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
